description: In order to avenge his insult against wealthy Hoshiarchand Choudhary; Pandit Shaadiram Gharjodhe asks Raju; a coolie by profession to masquerade as a wealthy business tycoon so that he can get marry to Choudhary's daughter Malti.
keywords: numero symbol in title,typographic abbreviation in title,period in title,insult,love
name: Coolie No. 1

review.name: Rip off of Tamil "Chinna Maaplai"
review.reviewBody:
RATED 7/10 Language: Hindi Source: Hotstar

I started to watch because this is blockbuster. After 10 minutes realised that it is remake (rip off) of "Chinna Maapillai". Lost interest on that point. Just for Govinda and songs completed this one.

No one can match with Crazy Mohan dialogs in the original one. As I liked the Tamil version more, this one not stick in my mind.

One time watchable for the story that explores the comedy in each and every scene.

I would suggest to watch the original one than this one.
